text: How Do You Know is a 2010 American comedy-drama movie produced by Julie Ansell, James L. Brooks and Paula Weinstein, and written and directed by Brooks. It premiered on December 17, 2010 and received negative reviews with a 30% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 47 out of 100 from Metacritic. It became poor at the box office with $7.6 million made in North America, which made it eighth in the box office at its first weekend. It fell off the chart on the third weekend and grossed a total of $47,707,151 worldwide. It failed to recoup for its $120 million budget and made it a massive box-office bomb. == Cast == *Reese Witherspoon as Lisa Jorgenson *Paul Rudd as George Madison *Owen Wilson as Matty Reynolds *Jack Nicholson as Charles Madison *Dean Norris as Tom *Kathryn Hahn as Annie *Yuki Matsuzaki as Tori *Andrew Wilson as Matty's Teammate *Shelley Conn as Terry *Tony Shalhoub as Psychiatrist *Domenick Lombardozzi as Bullpen Pitcher *Ron McLarty as George's Lawyer *Lenny Venito as Al *Mark Linn-Baker as Ron *Molly Price as Coach Sally == Other websites == *How Do You Know's Official website * Category:2010 comedy- drama movies Category:2010 romantic comedy movies Category:2010 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: How Do You Know (movie)
